entries.title_d: Protect the freighter from Corsair aggression
entries.title: Lok System: Duty: Escort the Freighters
entries.thanks_4: You are pretty good, but back in my day we used to have to fight them will our bare knuckles.
entries.thanks_2: Did you see them blow up? Just like a firework.
entries.taunt_5: So you want to play rough?
entries.taunt_4: Just give us the freighter and we will only hurt you a little bit.
entries.taunt_2: Things are going to go badly for you.
entries.reason_5: The Corsair Pirates will be looking for us, be watchful.
entries.reason_4: The Corsair Pirates will be looking for us, be watchful.
entries.reason_3: The Corsair Pirates will be looking for us, be watchful.
entries.reason_2: Oh look, the owl will protect me from the cat.  How nice.
entries.reason_1: The Corsair Pirates will be looking for us, be watchful.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel here to meet up with the freighter
entries.quest_location_d: A smuggler route in the Lok system
entries.quest_escort_d: Protect our trade goods from Corsair raiders
entries.panic_5: I knew they would show up.
entries.panic_4: Pirates! They think they have the advantage, but you will show them.
entries.panic_3: Protect me! This bucket of bolts cannot take many hits.
entries.panic_2: They are after my precious cargo!
entries.found_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Location to rendezvous point set. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.failed_protect: You have failed to protect the transport.
entries.failed_destroy: You have failed to protect the transport.
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile activity has ceased. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Hostile craft approacing on attack vector. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Nav Computer: < \#pcontrast1 You have arrived at the designated position. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: The mission was aborted, this is horrible.
